com.parkingtycoon.controllers

Class SimulationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController
      • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.SimulationController

  • public class SimulationController
extends BaseController
    This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called multiple times per frame depending on the speed of the simulation.
    Author:
    GGG

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()
        Start a new thread that starts calling update().

      • update

        public void update()
        We try to update the screen as many times as possible as long as it is less than the maximum amount of updates per second. This is the old Tick.

      • registerUpdatable

        public void registerUpdatable(UpdatableController updatable)
        Register a Controller as a controller that would like to we updated.
        Parameters:
        updatable - the controller that would like to register.

      • unregisterUpdatable

        public void unregisterUpdatable(UpdatableController updatable)
        UnRegister a Controller as a controller that would like to we updated.
        Parameters:
        updatable - the controller that would like to remove itself from the list of Updatables.

      • setUpdatesPerSecond

        public void setUpdatesPerSecond(int updatesPerSecond)
        SETTER set the desired updates per second.
        Parameters:
        updatesPerSecond - the amount of updates you would like to hit.

      • getUpdatesPerSecond

        public int getUpdatesPerSecond()
        GETTER get the desired updates per second.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause the simulation.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        resume the simulation.

      • togglePaused

        public void togglePaused()
        toggle the simulation on and off.

      • getUpdates

        public long getUpdates()
        GETTER get the amount of updates until now.
        Returns:
        the counter that counts the amount of updates that have passed.
